   16: -module(private_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   24: %% Suite configuration
   25: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   26: all() ->
   27:     [{group, private_positive},
   28:      {group, private_negative}].
   29: 
   30: groups() ->
   31:     [{private_positive, [sequence], positive_test_cases()},
   32:       {private_negative, [sequence], negative_test_cases()}].
   33:                                       %% FIXME: broken exmpp prevents us from sending
   34:                                       %% out elements without NS set
   35:                                       %% missing_ns]}].
   36: positive_test_cases() ->
   37:     [store_retrieve].
   38: negative_test_cases() ->
   39:     [get_other_user,
   40:      set_other_user].
   41: suite() ->
   42:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   45:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   46: 
   47: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   48:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   49: 
   50: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   52: 
   53: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   55: 
   56: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   57:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   58: 
   59: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   60:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   61: 
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: %% Private storage tests
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: store_retrieve(Config) ->
   66:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   67:                   fun(Alice) ->
   68:                           NS = <<"alice:private:ns">>,
   69: 
   70:                           %% Alice stores some data in her private storage
   71:                           PrivateStanza = escalus_stanza:private_set(my_banana(NS)),
   72:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, PrivateStanza),
   73: 
   74:                           %% Alice receives store confirmation
   75:                           escalus:assert(
   76:                             is_iq_result,
   77:                             [PrivateStanza],
   78:                             escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
   79: 
   80:                           %% Alice asks for the data
   81:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:private_get(NS, <<"my_element">>)),
   82: 
   83:                           %% Alice ensures data has not been changed
   84:                           Stanza = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   85:                           escalus:assert(is_private_result, Stanza),
   86:                           check_body(Stanza, [<<"my_element">>, <<"banana">>]),
   87: 
   88:                           %% Alice asks for non-existing data
   89:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:private_get(<<"non_existing_ns">>,
   90:                                                                                 <<"my_element">>)),
   91: 
   92:                           %% Alice receives an empty response
   93:                           Stanza2 = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   94:                           escalus:assert(is_private_result, Stanza2),
   95:                           check_body(Stanza, [<<"my_element">>])
   96:                   end).
   97: 
   98: get_other_user(Config) ->
   99:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  100:                   fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  101:                           NS = <<"bob:private:ns">>,
  102: 
  103:                           %% Alice asks for Bob's private data
  104:                           GetIQ = escalus_stanza:private_get(NS, <<"my_element">>),
  105:                           IQ = escalus_stanza:to(GetIQ, bob),
  106:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, IQ),
  107: 
  108:                           %% Alice gets an error
  109:                           Stanza = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  110:                           escalus:assert(is_private_error, Stanza),
  111:                           escalus_pred:is_error(<<"cancel">>, forbidden, Stanza)
  112:                   end).
  113: 
  114: set_other_user(Config) ->
  115:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  116:                   fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
  117:                           NS = <<"bob:private:ns">>,
  118: 
  119:                           %% Alice asks for Bob's private data
  120:                           IQ = escalus_stanza:to(escalus_stanza:private_set(my_banana(NS)), bob),
  121:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, IQ),
  122: 
  123:                           %% Alice gets a forbidden error
  124:                           Stanza = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  125:                           escalus:assert(is_private_error, Stanza),
  126:                           escalus_pred:is_error(<<"cancel">>, forbidden, Stanza)
  127:                   end).
  128: 
  129: missing_ns(Config) ->
  130:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
  131:                   fun(Alice) ->
  132:                           %% Alice asks for her own private storage, without
  133:                           %% providing a namespace for a child
  134:                           MyBanana = #xmlel{name = <<"my_element">>,
  135:                                                  children = [#xmlel{name = <<"banana">>}]},
  136:                           IQ = escalus_stanza:private_get(MyBanana),
  137:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, IQ),
  138: 
  139:                           %% Alice gets a bad-format error
  140:                           Stanza = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  141:                           escalus:assert(is_private_error, Stanza),
  142:                           escalus_pred:is_error(<<"modify">>, 'bad-format', Stanza)
  143:                   end).
  144: 
  145: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  146: %% Helpers
  147: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  148: 
  149: my_banana(NS) ->
  150:     #xmlel{
  151:         name = <<"my_element">>,
  152:         attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, NS}],
  153:         children = [#xmlel{name = <<"banana">>}]}.
  154: 
  155: check_body(Stanza, Names) ->
  156:     Query = exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"query">>),
  157:     check_body_rec(Query, Names).
  158: 
  159: check_body_rec(_, []) ->
  160:     ok;
  161: check_body_rec(Element, [Name | Names]) ->
  162:     [Child] = Element#xmlel.children,
  163:     Name = Child#xmlel.name,
  164:     check_body_rec(Child, Names).
  165:
